【Hygienic & Effortless Maintenance】 Smooth polished surface prevents litter adhesion, and the rust-proof material allows thorough sanitization with soap or high-pressure water. Dries instantly for immediate reuse

name: Stainless Steel Litter Scoop, Kitty Litter Scooper, Metal Cat Litter Scoop, Kitten Pooper Lifter, Cat Scooper, Kitty Metal Scooper with Holder for Cat Litter Box Round Holes Easy Cleaning
short_description: Dual-Size Holes for All Litter Types – This stainless steel cat litter scoop features 4mm micro-holes for fine litter and 6mm gaps for large clumps, doubling as both a litter sifter and litter shovel. Smooth edges and angled holes prevent litter from sticking, eliminating the need for a separate box scooper!

Complete Cat Litter Kit with Storage – Includes metal litter scooper, sponge scrubber, and 3 storage options: wall hook, litter scooper holder, or non-slip base. Non-stick surface ensures zero residue, fitting all litter boxes (15x13.1cm head + 13cm handle).

1-Minute Tool-Free Assembly – Assemble this metal cat litter scoop with holder in 4 steps: insert screw, attach handle, tighten with wrench, adjust angle. With seamless edges and smooth, clump-resistant holes (cat litter slides off effortlessly), it outperforms fragile plastic scoops.

5-Second Non-Stick Cleanup – Stainless steel litter scoop’s polished surface prevents litter from clogging, repelling even sticky mud. Rinse without scrubbing and store via holder or hook—no residue after cat poop scooping!

Durable Metal & No-Mess Storage Solutions – Rust-proof steel and hassle-free design (no trapped litter in corners) last longer than plastic kitty scoops. Store clean and dry on the base, wall, or bin—no clumps left in your litter box!
